SMW Subobject for BasicNPC location: Appears upon a player's deathUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 9856Examine: Someone's been dead round here. Tut tut.Release date: 25 June 2020Image: File:Grave.pngIs members only: falseIs variant of: Grave

Graves are objects that appear upon a players death after visiting Death in Death's Office.

These appear either at the spot the player died or outside the instance the player died in. They are indicated on the minimap with a gravestone icon. Players have 15 minutes after respawning to return to their grave and collect any items that were not protected on death. The 15-minute timer does not count down when a player is logged out.

Graves can be accessed from a distance of up to 7 tiles away. Items worth less than 100,000 are returned for free, but items worth more have a 1% reclamation fee. This fee is capped at 500,000 for graves. After 15 minutes, leftover items will be sent to Death's Office where the reclamation fee is 5% but items will be stored indefinitely. Ironmen get a 50% discount on both reclamations, making the fees 0.5% and 2.5% respectively.

The angel aesthetic for the gravestone can be bought at Death's Office for 200,000.

'''Graves''' are objects that appear upon a players death after visiting [[Death (NPC)|Death]] in [[Death's Office]].

These appear either at the spot the player died or outside the instance the player died in. They are indicated on the minimap with a gravestone icon. Players have 15 minutes after respawning to return to their grave and collect any items that were not protected on death. The 15-minute timer does not count down when a player is logged out.

Graves can be accessed from a distance of up to 7 tiles away. Items worth less than {{Coins|100000}} are returned for free, but items worth more have a 1% reclamation fee. This fee is capped at {{Coins|500000}} for graves. After 15 minutes, leftover items will be sent to [[Death's Office]] where the reclamation fee is 5% but items will be stored indefinitely. Ironmen get a 50% discount on both reclamations, making the fees 0.5% and 2.5% respectively.

The angel aesthetic for the gravestone can be bought at [[Death's Office]] for {{Coins|200000}}.
